item.title: /Uses/
item.description: I’m regularly interested to understand the kind of software and hardware are others using in their daily routines. This page intends to share my current setup. Additionally, you can check the awesome-uses repository that covers a good list of uses from other bloggers: https://github.com/wesbos/awesome-uses ðŸ’» The tools I use on a MacBook Pro 2018 Work Environment VS Code: My primary IDE, used to open single files, scripting, markdown. JetBrains: For large projects.
